description: Development of an Iraqi National Humanitarian Mine Action Organisation in Southern Iraq capable of  independently conducting Mine Action activities in support of agricultural development.

subproject.corporate outcome: Effective, responsive, accessible and fair justice systems promote the rule of law, including both formal and informal processes, with due consideration on the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups
subproject.description:
Output in Interim Country Strategy 09-10: Non-governmental institutions strengthened to undertake demining and provide assistance to the victims of landmines and explosive remnants of war in an effective manner.

Supoprt is provided to the developemnt of a national humanitarian mine action organisation, to enable it to independantly conduct clearance and mine risk education in the most vulnerable communities in the south of Iraq, therefor promoting rural and agricutlural development.
subproject.title: Mine Action organisation

subproject.description:
Output in Interim Country Strategy 09-10: Non-governmental institutions strengthened to undertake demining and provide assistance to the victims of landmines and explosive remnants of war in an effective manner.

Supoprt is provided to the developemnt of a national humanitarian mine action organisation, to enable it to independantly conduct clearance and mine risk education in the most vulnerable communities in the south of Iraq, therefor promoting rural and agricutlural development.
subproject.title: Mine Action organisation

subproject.description:
1.1: 36 square km of agricultural land cleared of landmines and ERW
1.2: Professional skills and technical skills further developed
1.3: Effective information sharing and cooperation between RMAC and RDO strengthened
subproject.title: Mine Action in Southern Iraq

title: Development  of a National Mine Action Organisation
